title: Supreme Court says abortion pill mifepristone will remain broadly available during legal battle
description: Mifepristone has become the central flashpoint in the legal battle over abortion since the Supreme Court last summer overturned Roe v. Wade.

title: Google's 80-acre San Jose mega-campus is on hold as company reckons with economic slowdown
description: Construction of Google's 7.3 million square foot campus in San Jose, California, has been halted as the company's cost-cutting efforts stifle development.

title: Elon Musk had a rough week across his empire — Tesla, Twitter and SpaceX
description: Elon Musk's week was capped on Friday when institutional shareholders in Tesla admonished the company's board of directors to rein in the "over-committed" CEO.

title: NFL suspends five players for violating gambling policy
description: Quintez Cephus and C.J. Moore of the Detroit Lions, and Shaka Toney of the Washington Commanders were suspended indefinitely for gambling-policy violations.

title: 'Utterly irresponsible': SVB failure was caused by a banking — not tech — crisis, top VC says
description: Anne Glover, CEO and co-founder of Amadeus Capital, said Friday that the SVB crisis was caused by "utterly irresponsible" practices by Silicon Valley Bank.

title: Twitter drops labels for President Joe Biden, state-affiliated and government-funded media
description: The labels for both government officials and state-affiliated media were introduced in 2020 as part of an effort to protect political discourse on the platform.

title: MIT neuroscientist: The No. 1 skill that sets people with ‘excellent memory’ apart from those who struggle—'it's rare'
description: Memory skills vary from one person to another. MIT Sloan neuroscientist Dr. Tara Swart Bieber shares how she trains her brain to prevent memory decline as we age.

title: Oxford malaria vaccine rollout could have 'major' implications in sub-Saharan Africa, economist says
description: Nigeria this week joined Ghana in provisionally approving a new malaria vaccine developed by scientists at the University of Oxford.

title: A recession is coming — and stock markets won't come through it unscathed, strategist says
description: The latest U.S. economic data suggests a recession is coming, according to the chief executive of financial advisory firm Longview Economics.

title: UK Deputy Prime Minister Dominic Raab resigns over bullying investigation
description: U.K. Deputy Prime Minister Dominic Raab resigned on Friday, following an inquiry into bullying allegations.

title: Economists and policymakers were fretting about a wage-price spiral. Not any more
description: Higher wages haven't produced a 1970s-style wage-price spiral. In fact, some economists say wages can and should continue to rise.

title: People said her business idea wouldn’t work — but it’s now a blooming beauty empire
description: Trinny Woodall founded her beauty company Trinny London in 2017 and has since turned it into a successful business. She shares advice for female founders.

title: Volkswagen takes on China's EV market with a higher-end car and $1 billion investment
description: German automaker Volkswagen is investing about $1 billion in China for electric car development, and releasing a vehicle targeted at a higher end of the market.

title: ChatGPT won't take over from humans for now, says founder of Indian tech giant
description: Nothing can beat the human mind — not even AI-powered chatbots like ChatGPT, says Narayana Murthy, the founder of Infosys.
